title: ILinearPatternFeatureData.D2EndRefOffset
description: Gets or sets the distance of the last pattern instance from up-to reference geometry in Direction 2 of this bidirectional linear pattern feature.
returns: Offset of the last pattern instance from ILinearPatternFeatureData::D2EndReference
remarks:
This property is valid only if
ILinearPatternFeatureData::D2EndCondition
is set to
swPatternEndCondition_e
.swPatternEndCondition_UpToReference.
Whether to offset instance geometry or a centroid is governed by
ILinearPatternFeatureData::D2EndUseSeedReference
.
